description:
Luffy goes down fast after Monet puts a chill into him, and Trafalgar Law makes a desperate attempt to reclaim his heart during an electric battle with Vergo!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy Dies from Exposure?! The Spine-chilling Snow Woman Monet!
Luffy Toushi!? Kyoufu no Yukionna Monet!
Luffy in difficoltà!? La gelida morsa di Mone!
Luffy, congelé ? Monet, l’abominable femmes des neiges !
¿¡Luffy muerto de frío!? ¡La aterradora mujer de las nieves, Monet!
Луффи заморозили до смерти? Ужасная снежная женщина Моне!
لوفي يموت متجمّدًا؟! امرأة الثّلج المرعبة موني!
ルフィ凍死!? 恐怖の雪女モネ!
